_header: Nowell ell both elde and young
_description: A Christmas carol — eight quatrains (aaab) and ‘Nowel el’ burden

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Nowel el boþe eld & ȝyngNowel el now
                    mow we syng…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Fro helle pet þu vs schyldAmen amen now synge
                    we
